description.@en: Being a remnant of the old guard, you canâ€™t help but struggle adjusting to new things. It is your duty to remind these youngbloods that sometimes the old ways are the best ways.

effect.@en: Immediately change your Order Alignment to Wisdom and your Chaos Alignment to Rancor. In addition, you must spend an additional 50 Reward Points to buy Skill Ranks.
